name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
description: American actor, filmmaker, and entrepreneur known for his versatile roles in film and television.

content.title: Biography
content.body: **Joseph Gordon-Levitt** was born on February 17, 1981, in Los Angeles, California. He began his career as a child actor, appearing in several television shows and commercials in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Gordon-Levitt gained initial fame for his role as Tommy Solomon in the television series *3rd Rock from the Sun*.

content.title: Career
content.body: Gordon-Levitt transitioned into adult roles with films like *10 Things I Hate About You* and achieved critical acclaim with *Brick* and *500 Days of Summer*. He is known for his collaborations with director Christopher Nolan, appearing in *Inception* and *The Dark Knight Rises*. Gordon-Levitt's approach is often characterized by his diverse choice of roles and his commitment to independent cinema.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: He frequently collaborates with director Christopher Nolan and has worked alongside actors such as Leonardo DiCaprio in *Inception* and Bruce Willis in *Looper*. Gordon-Levitt also directed and starred in the film *Don Jon*.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Joseph Gordon-Levitt is respected for his versatility and dedication to his craft. He co-founded the online media company HitRecord, which has won several Emmy Awards. His work in both commercial blockbusters and independent films has established him as a prominent figure in contemporary cinema.
